dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare intrude upon these haunted woods, mortal? What foolishness drives you here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand the darkness that grips these lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity will be your undoing, for in the shadows, truths are twisted and horrors lie in wait.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come not seeking confrontation, but knowledge and balance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Balance? Mortals prattle on about such lofty ideals, unaware of the abyss that gazes back.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer respect for the spirits and seek a peaceful resolution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Ha! Mortals and their fickle ideals. Your words are as empty as the promises of dawn in these cursed lands.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you reject peaceful discourse, then let our actions speak for us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions speak louder than words, indeed. Let darkness and death be the only discourse between us.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am prepared to face the darkness head-on if need be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or folly, mortal? Time will reveal the truth, but know that shadows hunger for foolish courage.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall not be swayed by fear, for I walk in the light of determination.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light? Determination? Your words ring hollow, for the shadows care not for the flicker of mortal will.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you seek conflict, then let it be a battle of strength and will.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Battle it shall be, mortal. The dance of shadows and blood begins now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense a deeper connection to these shadows, a bond that transcends mortal understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Connection, bond? Mortals weave tales to comfort their fragile hearts, but darkness knows no ties, save that of eternal night.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us embrace the shadows together, finding harmony in the dance of twilight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Harmony? Twilight? Delusion and madness cloud your vision, mortal. Embrace darkness, for it embraces you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you reject the notion of kinship, then let our blades clash in discord.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Clash they shall, mortal. Discord and chaos reign supreme in the realm of shadows.
